parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.label: Client
parameters.query: resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.operationsmanagement/solutions' | where name contains 'SecurityInsights' | project id = tostring(properties.workspaceResourceId)

parameters.name: AlertName
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize count() by DisplayName
| order by count_ desc
| project-away count_

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(60d)
| where AlertName in ({AlertName})
| distinct AlertName, Provider = ProductComponentName, Tactics, Techniques, Description
content.title: Alert Details

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Title in ({AlertName})
| where Status == "Closed"
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project Classification, Comment = ClassificationComment, Reason = ClassificationReason, IncidentNumber, Title
content.title: SecurityIncident

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Title in ({AlertName})
| where Status == "Closed"
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| summarize count() by Classification
| render piechart with(title="Classifications")
content.title: SecurityIncident Classifications

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Title in ({AlertName})
| where Status == "Closed"
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| summarize count() by ClassificationReason
| render piechart with(title="Classifications")
content.title: SecurityIncident ClassificationReason

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertName contains "{AlertName}"
| extend EntitiesParsed = parse_json(Entities)
| extend Account1 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[0].Name) 
| extend Account2 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[1].Name) 
| extend Account3 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[2].Name) 
| extend Account4 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[3].Name) 
| extend Account5 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[4].Name) 
| extend Account6 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[5].Name) 
| extend Account7 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[6].Name) 
| extend Account8 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[7].Name) 
| extend Account9 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[8].Name) 
| extend Account10 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[9].Name) 
| extend Accounts = pack_array(Account1, Account2, Account3, Account4, Account5, Account6, Account7, Account8, Account9, Account10)
| mv-expand Accounts to typeof(string)
| where Accounts != "" // Filter out empty values
| summarize Count = count() by Accounts
| order by Count desc
content.title: Account Entities

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertName in ({AlertName})
| extend EntitiesParsed = parse_json(Entities)
| extend Host1 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[0].HostName) 
| extend Host2 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[1].HostName) 
| extend Host3 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[2].HostName) 
| extend Host4 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[3].HostName) 
| extend Host5 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[4].HostName) 
| extend Host6 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[5].HostName) 
| extend Host7 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[6].HostName) 
| extend Host8 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[7].HostName) 
| extend Host9 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[8].HostName) 
| extend Host10 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[9].HostName) 
| extend Hosts = pack_array(Host1, Host2, Host3, Host4, Host5, Host6, Host7, Host8, Host9, Host10)
| mv-expand Hosts to typeof(string)
| where Hosts != "" // Filter out empty values
| summarize Count = count() by Hosts
| order by Count desc
content.title: Hosts Entities

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertName in ({AlertName})
| extend EntitiesParsed = parse_json(Entities)
| extend Address1 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[0].Address) 
| extend Address2 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[1].Address) 
| extend Address3 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[2].Address) 
| extend Address4 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[3].Address) 
| extend Address5 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[4].Address) 
| extend Address6 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[5].Address) 
| extend Address7 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[6].Address) 
| extend Address8 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[7].Address) 
| extend Address9 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[8].Address) 
| extend Address10 = tostring(EntitiesParsed[9].Address)
| extend Addresses = pack_array(Address1, Address2, Address3, Address4, Address5, Address6, Address7, Address8, Address9, Address10)
| mv-expand Addresses to typeof(string)
| where Addresses != "" // Filter out empty values
| summarize Count = count() by Addresses
| order by Count desc
content.title: Address Entities

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0] == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| summarize arg_max(CreatedTime, *) by IncidentNumber
| project IncidentNumber, AlertIds 
| mv-expand AlertIds to typeof(string)
| join kind=inner SecurityAlert on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SystemAlertId
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities, 'Entity_')
| extend Entity_ImageFileName = tostring(column_ifexists("Entity_ImageFile.Name", "")),
          Entity_ParentProcessName = tostring(column_ifexists("Entity_ParentProcess.ImageFile", "{}")),
          Entity_ParentProcessId = tostring(column_ifexists("Entity_ParentProcess.ProcessId", "")),
          Entity_Directory = tostring(column_ifexists("Entity_Directory", ""))
| extend Entity_ParentProcessName = tostring(parse_json(Entity_ParentProcessName).Name),
          Entity_FileHashes = todynamic(column_ifexists("Entity_FileHashes", dynamic([])))
| mv-expand Entity_FileHashes
| extend HashAlgorithm = tostring(Entity_FileHashes.Algorithm), 
          HashValue = tostring(Entity_FileHashes.Value)
| extend SHA1 = iif(HashAlgorithm == "SHA1", HashValue, ""),
          SHA256 = iif(HashAlgorithm == "SHA256", HashValue, ""),
          MD5 = iif(HashAlgorithm == "MD5", HashValue, "")
| extend ATP_InvestigationState = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["MicrosoftDefenderAtp.InvestigationState"])
| summarize SHA1 = max(column_ifexists("SHA1", "")), 
            SHA256 = max(column_ifexists("SHA256", "")), 
            MD5 = max(column_ifexists("MD5", "")) 
            by IncidentNumber, AlertIds, TimeGenerated, AlertName, CompromisedEntity, 
            Entity_Name = column_ifexists("Entity_Name", ""), 
            Entity_Directory, Entity_HostName = column_ifexists("Entity_HostName", ""), 
            Entity_FQDN = column_ifexists("Entity_FQDN", ""), 
            Entity_LastExternalIpAddress = column_ifexists("Entity_LastExternalIpAddress", ""), 
            Entity_LastIpAddress = column_ifexists("Entity_LastIpAddress", ""), 
            Entity_LastSeen = column_ifexists("Entity_LastSeen", ""), 
            Entity_OnboardingStatus = column_ifexists("Entity_OnboardingStatus", ""), 
            Entity_OSFamily = column_ifexists("Entity_OSFamily", ""), 
            Entity_OSVersion = column_ifexists("Entity_OSVersion", ""), 
            LoggedOnUsers = tostring((column_ifexists(tostring("LoggedOnUsers"), ""))), 
            Entity_RiskScore = column_ifexists("Entity_RiskScore", ""), 
            Entity_Sid = column_ifexists("Entity_Sid", ""), 
            Entity_UserPrincipalName = column_ifexists("Entity_UserPrincipalName", ""), 
            Entity_CommandLine = column_ifexists("Entity_CommandLine", ""), 
            Entity_ImageFileName, 
            Entity_ProcessId = column_ifexists("Entity_ProcessId", ""), 
            Entity_ParentProcessName, 
            Entity_ParentProcessId, 
            ATP_InvestigationState
| extend TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated, AlertName = AlertName, CompromisedEntity = CompromisedEntity, ATP_InvestigationState = ATP_InvestigationState, Name = Entity_Name, 
          Directory = Entity_Directory, SHA1 = SHA1, SHA256 = SHA256, MD5 = MD5, HostName = Entity_HostName, FQDN = Entity_FQDN, LastExternalIpAddress = Entity_LastExternalIpAddress, 
          LastIpAddress = Entity_LastIpAddress, LastSeen = Entity_LastSeen, OnboardingStatus = Entity_OnboardingStatus, OSFamily = Entity_OSFamily, 
          OSVersion = Entity_OSVersion, LoggedOnUsers, RiskScore = Entity_RiskScore, Sid = Entity_Sid, 
          UserPrincipalName = Entity_UserPrincipalName, CommandLine = Entity_CommandLine, ImageFileName = Entity_ImageFileName, 
          ProcessId = Entity_ProcessId, ParentProcessName = Entity_ParentProcessName, ParentProcessId = Entity_ParentProcessId
| project TimeGenerated, AlertName, CompromisedEntity, ATP_InvestigationState, Name, 
          Directory, SHA1, SHA256, MD5, HostName, FQDN, LastExternalIpAddress, 
          LastIpAddress, LastSeen, OnboardingStatus, OSFamily, 
          OSVersion, LoggedOnUsers, RiskScore, Sid, 
          UserPrincipalName, CommandLine, ImageFileName, 
          ProcessId, ParentProcessName, ParentProcessId
| where AlertName in ({AlertName})
content.title: XDR Alert Entities

content.query:
let TimeInterval = 1d; // Adjust the time interval as necessary
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated between ({Timerange:start} .. {Timerange:end})
| where AlertName in ({AlertName})
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, TimeInterval)
| union (
    range TimeGenerated from {Timerange:start} to {Timerange:end} step TimeInterval
    | extend Count = 0 // This creates the zero-value rows for dates without any logs
)
| summarize EventCount = sum(Count) by bin(TimeGenerated, TimeInterval)
| render timechart
content.title: Alert triggers per day
